name: Tear of the Goddess
passive: Mana +300 Max Mana +10 Ability Haste Awe: 10% of Mana spent is refunded. Mana Charge: Increases max Mana by 7 every time Mana is spent. Caps at 700 bonus Mana . Triggers up to 3 times every 12 seconds. You may only carry one Tear of the Goddess item at a time. 900.
